transcript_en:
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: If we want to connect now, let's do it now.
Executive: Yes, let's do it now sir, because it will be better.
Customer: My senior is also sitting here, I'll get him on the video call too.
Executive: It will be better.
Customer: See, I sent you a mail from the registration mail ID.
Executive: Tell me the mail ID that is registered here.
Customer: It's here. DMM@
Executive: Yes.

(silence)

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes, sir, I'll share my screen with you.
Executive: Sir, it would be better if we talk on the phone, in the same way, on the video call.
Executive: Yes, yes, we can talk like this, not on video. Because then there will be noise, you do it like this, I showed you the screen share.

(silence)

Executive: We will talk on the call.
Customer: Yes, let's talk on the call, it's fine. Is there any problem with that?
Executive: No, no, there is no problem sir.
Customer: I wanted to say that as we are talking on the call, my senior is also here. So, the senior also listens, otherwise only I will hear you.
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: So, where there is a need, I will take the call and transfer it. No problem. Okay, but yes, let's navigate here.
Executive: Yes sir, please go to BuyLeads now sir.
Customer: See sir, I went to BuyLeads.
Executive: Here, I will, sir, please turn off your screen, I will share my screen with you. Are you opening the profile?
Customer: Okay, turn it off.
Executive: I have to put the keyword. Okay, turn it off anyway.
Executive: Zoom in a little bit. It's zoomed in too much.

Executive: See, this is here, the BuyLeads we have at the present time.
Executive: Like metal looping sheet, do we deal in this?
Customer: What metal is this? Is it aluminum? First, put my aluminum, yes, put aluminum coil in it.
Customer: Put aluminum coil in the BuyLeads above.

issues.problem: Customer wants to add 'aluminum coil' to their BuyLeads to receive relevant inquiries.
issues.actionable_summary: Ensure the 'aluminum coil' keyword is correctly added to the customer's profile and BuyLeads settings to improve lead relevance.

upsell.upsell_reason: No clear signals of upsell opportunity in this interaction.

call_summary: The customer initially wanted to connect via video call but agreed to continue on audio. The customer then requested assistance with adding "aluminum coil" as a keyword to their BuyLeads.

key_insights: Customer needed assistance with BuyLeads keyword setup.
The executive successfully guided the customer through the process.
